In this game Florencio combines two flavours of cheese to create the perfect early game push. value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED Result! (Maru vs Harstem)
value.excerpt: Very fun match of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru and Harstem. While most of the time we see Protoss players forced into Colossus because of Marine Marauder unit compositions, in this game Harstem decides to go for Carriers with Disruptors because of Maru's Mech army. value.title: How to beat the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #2 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. After Spirit (Soul) tried it first, the next person brave enough to try it is PiLiPiLi, a Protoss player. He took on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build.
